TextBody:
Hi Lucas,

Do you remember by any chance if the customer has partitioning enabled? Or if they can send us a screenshot of the Logs section so we can see from there?

We can also schedule a remote session with them and apply the upgrades together through Offline Patches.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #413644 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CX4ty:ref - EMGEPRON - Upgrade EPP from 5.6.0.0 to 5.9.3.0 without internet [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CX4ty:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Lucas,

Please find below the Offline Patches.

Before starting the upgrade process we strongly recommend creating a Snapshot of the EPP Server from the VM. Please also create a Snapshot after applying the 5.8.1.0 Offline patch just as a precaution.

To upgrade the EPP server to the 5.7.0.0, 5.7.1.0, 5.8.0.0 ... 5.9.3.0 versions, you will have to access Dashboard -> Live Update -> Offline patch uploader.
 
Please select Choose File -> Select the patch file 5.7.0.0 -> Upload Patch. Please wait a few moments after pressing Upload Patch and you should receive a green message on the top of the page that the upload was successful. You can track the progress of the installation in Dashboard -> Live Update(it takes about 5 - 10 minutes per patch).

Please repeat the steps for each EPP server version upgrade and in order: 5.6.0.0 -> 5.7.0.0 -> 5.7.1.0 -> 5.8.0.0 -> 5.8.1.0 -> 5.9.0.0 -> 5.9.1.0 -> 5.9.2.0 -> 5.9.3.0.

Offline Patch download links:
EPP5700 offline patch:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500555700.tar.gz

EPP 5710 maintenance offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500585710.tar.gz

EPP 5800 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500595800.tar.gz

EPP 5810 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500605810.tar.gz

EPP5900 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500615900.tar.gz

EPP5910 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500625910.tar.gz

EPP5920 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500635920.tar.gz

EPP5930 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500645930.tar.gz


Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

We discovered that emgepron had a problem with disk size before making the
upgrade and the audit logs are not solving, can we schedule a time
between 9-11 BRT or 14-17 BRT? So we can clean it up and so on.

Best regards,

Hello team,
 

We discovered that emgepron had a problem with disk size before making the upgrade and the audit logs are not solving, can we schedule a time between 9-11 BRT or 14-17 BRT? So we can clean it up and so on.

 

Best regards,

 


On Fri, Jul 5, 2024 at 2:30?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Lucas,

Please also apply the latest Vulnerability patch for the customer as well, or let me know when you would like us to have a remote session so we can apply it together.

This Offline Patch should be applied over the 5.9.3.0 EPP server version.

Download link:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/MP-HWA-EPP4-U8800.tar.gz

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Netwrix Support [techsupport@netwrix.com]
Sent: 7/1/2024 11:16 PM
To: lucas.cavalcante@fcbrasil.com.br
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #413644 - - EMGEPRON - Upgrade EPP from 5.6.0.0 to 5.9.3.0 without internet [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CX4ty:ref ]

Hi Lucas,

Please find below the Offline Patches.

Before starting the upgrade process we strongly recommend creating a Snapshot of the EPP Server from the VM. Please also create a Snapshot after applying the 5.8.1.0 Offline patch just as a precaution.

To upgrade the EPP server to the 5.7.0.0, 5.7.1.0, 5.8.0.0 ... 5.9.3.0 versions, you will have to access Dashboard -> Live Update -> Offline patch uploader.
 
Please select Choose File -> Select the patch file 5.7.0.0 -> Upload Patch. Please wait a few moments after pressing Upload Patch and you should receive a green message on the top of the page that the upload was successful. You can track the progress of the installation in Dashboard -> Live Update(it takes about 5 - 10 minutes per patch).

Please repeat the steps for each EPP server version upgrade and in order: 5.6.0.0 -> 5.7.0.0 -> 5.7.1.0 -> 5.8.0.0 -> 5.8.1.0 -> 5.9.0.0 -> 5.9.1.0 -> 5.9.2.0 -> 5.9.3.0.

Offline Patch download links:
EPP5700 offline patch:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500555700.tar.gz

EPP 5710 maintenance offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500585710.tar.gz

EPP 5800 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500595800.tar.gz

EPP 5810 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500605810.tar.gz

EPP5900 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500615900.tar.gz

EPP5910 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500625910.tar.gz

EPP5920 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500635920.tar.gz

EPP5930 offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500645930.tar.gz


Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

Hi Lucas,

Please find below the Offline Patches.

Before starting the upgrade process we strongly recommend creating a Snapshot of the EPP Server from the VM. Please also create a Snapshot after applying the 5.8.1.0 Offline patch just as a precaution.

To upgrade the EPP server to the 5.7.0.0, 5.7.1.0, 5.8.0.0 ... 5.9.3.0 versions, you will have to access Dashboard -> Live Update -> Offline patch uploader.
 
Please select Choose File -> Select the patch file 5.7.0.0 -> Upload Patch. Please wait a few moments after pressing Upload Patch and you should receive a green message on the top of the page that the upload was successful. You can track the progress of the installation in Dashboard -> Live Update(it takes about 5 - 10 minutes per patch).

Please repeat the steps for each EPP server version upgrade and in order: 5.6.0.0 -> 5.7.0.0 -> 5.7.1.0 -> 5.8.0.0 -> 5.8.1.0 -> 5.9.0.0 -> 5.9.1.0 -> 5.9.2.0 -> 5.9.3.0.

Offline Patch download links:
EPP5700 offline patch:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500555700.tar.gz

EPP 5710 maintenance offline patch
https://download.endpointprotector.com/offline_patches/EPP500585710.tar.gz
